text: Pokrovka () is a rural locality (a village) in Maloyazovsky Selsoviet, Salavatsky District, Bashkortostan, Russia. The population was 66 as of 2010. There is 1 street. == Geography == It is located 7 km from Maloyaz, 4 km from Tatarsky Maloyaz. == References == Category:Rural localities in Salavatsky District
title: Pokrovka, Salavatsky District, Republic of Bashkortostan
